Title: Code Injection
Description: Remote Code Execution in third party library swiftmailer.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.30, all versions starting from 7.6.0 before 7.6.15, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.5.0
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.30 before 7.6.0, all versions starting from 7.6.15 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.5.0
